snippet: In his quest to complete a career Grand Slam, Novak Djokovic could have to beat nine-time champion Rafael Nadal in the French Open semifinals....
lead_paragraph: In his quest to complete a career Grand Slam, Novak Djokovic could have to beat nine-time champion Rafael Nadal in the French Open semifinals.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic and Nadal Could Meet in French Open Semifinals
headline.main: Djokovic and Nadal Could Meet in French Open Semifinals
